divs: Sighting Detailswhile waiting with four other students for the bus at the bus stop, we noticed a slow moving green star. It was moving one direction overhead. We thought it might be a satalite and were discussing wether or not it was when it switched directions moving faster back the way it came. We watched in aw as it turned again and zoomed off out of sight. There was no sound no flashing lights it stayed a constant bright star size and green. We spent all day excited and talking about it in school. i have never seen anything like it!
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Salina
There were no other sightings in Salina on or around September 21st 2012
Summary: My 12year old son and four others saw green light while waiting for a bus
